text: Vântîrton han kulpui khom a minkhi sa nôka, male ânsâng hah feet 216 ania,21:17: ânsâng; aninônchu abit. minkhîna an mang ngâi a chôi dungjûiin.21:17: Archang 16 le 17 Greek abupuiin ati chu “12,000 furlong” male “144 cubits” maha neinun imini aluttie aninônchu aomtie mintêkna adôn anithei.
